business_snapshot.description: Bootstrapped coaching SaaS selling monthly subscriptions to coaches.
business_snapshot.goal: Double monthly recurring revenue in 6 months

bottlenecks.name: Lack of scalable lead generation
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Relying on inconsistent lead sources and not maximizing lead generation potential
tactical_fix: Invest in content marketing strategy for inbound leads
Establish partnerships and community engagement for long-term lead generation

analysis.top_recommendation: Focus on building a scalable lead generation engine to drive consistent growth

proposed_kpis.why: Directly tied to revenue growth and business health
Indicates effectiveness of sales process and lead quality
To measure the impact of content marketing efforts

analysis.summary: To achieve the goal of doubling monthly recurring revenue in 6 months, the focus should be on addressing the bottleneck of lack of scalable lead generation. By investing in content marketing and establishing partnerships, the business can drive consistent growth. Tracking MRR growth rate and lead conversion rate will be crucial KPIs to monitor progress.

bottlenecks.name: Low Conversion Rate of Strategy Sessions
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Messaging or offer may not resonate with target audience
tactical_fix: Reassess offer and messaging alignment with student needs
Increase audience connection through improved targeting

analysis.top_recommendation: Reassess offer and messaging alignment with student needs

proposed_kpis.why: To measure effectiveness of offer and messaging
To track improvement in connecting with target audience
To monitor customer retention and satisfaction

analysis.summary: To double monthly recurring revenue in 6 months, focus on improving conversion rate of strategy sessions by reassessing offer and messaging alignment with student needs, and increasing audience connection through improved targeting. Track Monthly Recurring Revenue and Number of Strategy Sessions Booked as key performance indicators, along with Conversion Rate of Strategy Sessions, Audience Engagement Rate, and Customer Churn Rate.

bottlenecks.name: Sales
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Lack of structured sales system and sales team training
tactical_fix: Train sales team on asking more questions and quantifying pain

analysis.top_recommendation: Implement a structured sales script and train the sales team on asking more questions and quantifying pain

proposed_kpis.why: To monitor customer retention and satisfaction
To track and increase customer value

analysis.summary: To double monthly recurring revenue in 6 months, focus on improving the sales process by implementing a structured sales script and training the sales team. Track leads and close rates while monitoring cost per lead, churn rate, and lifetime value to optimize performance and increase revenue.
